summary: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.
cast: Akkineni Nageshwara Rao|Nagarjuna Akkineni|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Shriya Saran|Amitabh Bachchan|Brahmanandam|M.S. Narayana|Akhil Akkineni|Ali|Jayaprakash Reddy|Krishna Murali Posani|Amala Akkineni|Srinivasa Reddy|Raashi Khanna|Chalapathi Rao|Krishnudu|Neetu Chandra|Kaushal Sharma|Tejaswi Madivada|Melkote|Srikar Chittarbu|Ramanaw Mallam|Duvvasi Mohan|Ramachandra|Sapthagiri|Chitram Seenu|Jimmeey Sirole|Lavanya Tripathi|Krishna Yadavin
title: Manam
